医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
AI生成的食物图像使某些人不安 - 这就是为什么研究人员发现，AI生成的食物图像，尤其是不完美的食物图像引起了不可思议的山谷效应，使它们显得令人毛骨悚然且不愉快，尤其是在食物新恐惧症的人中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/ai-generated-food-images-make-make-some-people-uneasye28094 heree28099S-Why.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/ai-generated-food-images-images-make-some-some-people-uneasye28094 heree28099s-why.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1944dba8-c723-4d1E-91E-91E7-9B91967D4BCA Mon, 24 Feb 2025 23:09:00 -0500 AI-generated food images make some people uneasy—here’s why
研究挑战BRCA1突变在前列腺癌开始中的作用如前所述，BRCA1基因的突变要么是遗传（种系）或获得（躯体）的（躯体）可能不是开始前列腺癌的关键，这表明，同类的首次研究，在线发表在Open Access Journal BMJ肿瘤学上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-challenges-role-of-brca1-moint-in-prostate-cancer-initiation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-challenges-role-of-brca1-moint-in-rostate-cancer-initiation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9606d311-dfb1-4554-A235-60113B53E544 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 21:00:12 -0500 Study challenges role of BRCA1 mutation in prostate cancer initiation
熊，推迟和蠕虫可以教会我们生存的深空？科学家们正在探索动物模型（射精，极端刺激者和小生物）如何使用AI驱动的监控来抵消长期空间旅行的健康风险，从而将这些发现转化为宇航员解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/what what-c​​an-bears-tardigrades-and-worms-teach-us-us-about-surviving-surviving-deep-space.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/what what-c​​an-bears-tardigrades-and-worms-and-worms-teach-us-about-about-surviving-surviving-space-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4E517B13-F380-44DC-9207-8B6E66686846C Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:57:00 -0500 What can bears, tardigrades, and worms teach us about surviving deep space?
研究人员发现了产生醛固酮的肿瘤中令人惊讶的复杂性层京都大学的研究人员发现了产生醛固酮的腺瘤（APA） - 肾上腺肿瘤的复杂性令人惊讶，可驱动高血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/researchers-uncover-a-scorprising-layer-complexity-in-complexity-in-aldstosterone-producing-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/researchers-uncover-a-sriver-layer-layer-complexity-in-complexity-in-aldstosterone-producing-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c937b32-3c23-3c23-48ec-bede-21E6F59BB202 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:56:00 -0500 Researchers uncover a surprising layer of complexity in aldosterone-producing tumors
机器学习算法解码免疫系统的隐藏数据以进行疾病检测您的免疫系统携带着一生的价值，这些信息的价值是它遇到的威胁 - 一种坏蛋的生物学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/machine-learning-algorithm-decodes-decodes-immune-systemee28099s-hidder-hidden-hidded-data-for-disease-disease-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/machine-learning-algorithm-decodes-immune-systemee28099s-hidde-hidded-data-for-disease-disease-disease-desease-saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= eea8cde6-7833-45bf-83d0-9570b5ddd68db Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:52:00 -0500 Machine learning algorithm decodes immune system’s hidden data for disease detection
研究发现，更高的“不良”胆固醇水平可能有助于撒丁岛的老年人寿命更长。较高的LDL胆固醇水平（≥130mg/dl）与撒丁岛非依恋植物学的较长的生存有关，这挑战了传统的信念，即较低的胆固醇总是更好。但是，胆固醇水平很高，尤其是在女性中，并未显示出额外的寿命益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/higher-bad-cholesterol-levels-may-help-sardiniae28099s-seniors-seniors-seniors-live-live-live-live-longer-study-study-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/higher-bad-cholesterol-levels-may-help-sardiniae28099s-seniors-seniors-live-live-live-live-live-study-study-study-study-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69e1bba9-032b-479c-80cf-46d60726c08f Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:34:00 -0500 Higher 'bad' cholesterol levels may help Sardinia’s seniors live longer, study finds
新成像工具揭示了大脑在耳蜗敏感性中的作用根据刚刚在《神经科学杂志》上发表的一项研究，大脑可能会通过向内耳中的结构发送信号来帮助耳朵对声音的敏感性，并弥补听力损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/new-imaging-tool-reveals-the-brains-the-brains-cochlea-sensitivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/new-imaging-tool-reveals-the-brains-the-brains-role--in-cochlea-sensitivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95F24472-2233-4FF5-980D-6EC1553D291D Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:23:06 -0500 New imaging tool reveals the brain's role in cochlea sensitivity
研究发现跨GP实践的前列腺癌检测有所不同一项LargesCale的研究发现，GP实践之间的巨大差异是关于它们是否可能使用血液检查来吸收前列腺癌的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-finds-variations-in-prostate-cancer-detection-actection-across-cancer-gp-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-finds-variations-inpostate-cancer-detection-actection-across-cancer-gp-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AC99BA5A-44444242-9150-339DDDAC6145 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:14:00 -0500 Study finds variations in prostate cancer detection across GP practices
褪黑激素补充剂可能有助于减少夜班工人的DNA损害补充褪黑激素可以通过提高人体修复能力来抵消与夜班工作相关的DNA损伤，这表明在线发表在《职业与环境医学》杂志上的小型临床试验的发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/melatonin-supplements-may-help-reduce-dna-dna-dna-dna-damage-ing-night-shift-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/melatonin-supplements-may-help-reduce-dna-dna-dna-dna-damage-in night-shift-shift-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d776b5d2-f60e-4177-A177-A12B-D734B935F350 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:10:00 -0500 Melatonin supplements may help reduce DNA damage in night shift workers
妇科条件可能会增加心脏病和中风的风险患有一种或多种常见的妇科疾病，例如子宫内膜异位症或重度或不规则时期，可能与影响大脑血液流动的心脏病的风险和状况的升高有关（脑血管疾病），发现了可用证据的汇总数据分析在线发表在《杂志》中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/gynecological-conditions-may-raise-raise-rise-risk-of-heart-disease-and-and-soesease-and-stroke.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/gynecological-conditions-may-raise-raise-rise-risk-fint-disease-and-disease-and-stroke-stroke-stroke.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2106576-e100-4820-8b16-dcedd9cea155 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:06:23 -0500 Gynecological conditions may raise risk of heart disease and stroke
